rows.text: On the exploration map you can manage your party by pressing I or clicking on the bottom bar.
To manage your Team while on the exploration map, press Y.
Once you are engaged in a battle you can't switch your gear. Choose wisely!
Every weapon and armor type has a unique special ability that can make the difference between success and failure!
If one of your party members is knocked out you can bring them back by using a medkit on them when standing next to them. If you wait too long, they will die!
You can use medkits outside of battle by right-clicking them on the team screen!
You can use medkits outside of battle from the Team page in your Journal!
Sell your unused items at the trader by right-clicking them. The cash will come in handy later!
